CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Lead_Quality__c, 'Qualified'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Status__c,'APOS Opportunity'), Opportunity__c=null ),
HYPERLINK('006/e?retURL=/' & Id & '&RecordType=012A0000000UvEp&00NA0000000bC8S=' & Id&'&opp4='& Account__r.Name &'&opp4_lkid=' & Account__r.Id&'&opp17='& Campaign__r.Name&'&00NA0000000b8l9=1&opp5=Deal/Bid - Direct&00N700000028ArQ=APOS&00N30000001O7vL=APOS&opp14='& Name &'&opp11=Discover - 10%25&nooverride=1' , IMAGE("resource/1298094458000/APOS_RT", 'APOS'),'_parent') & ' ' &
HYPERLINK('apex/MarketingExistingOppAssn?retURL=%2F' & Id & '&accountPlayId=' & Id & '&accid=' & Account__r.Id & '&campaignid=' & Campaign__c , IMAGE("resource/1268544881000/MA_ExistingOpptys", 'Existing Opportunity'),'_parent') ,
IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Lead_Quality__c, 'Qualified'),(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Status__c,'SMB Opportunity')), Opportunity__c=null ),
HYPERLINK('006/e?retURL=/' & Id & '&RecordType=012A0000000Vhy7&00NA0000000bC8S=' & Id&'&opp4='& Account__r.Name &'&opp4_lkid=' & Account__r.Id&'&opp17='& Campaign__r.Name&'&00NA0000000b8l9=1&opp5=Deal/Bid - Direct&opp11=Plan - 1%25&nooverride=1' , IMAGE("resource/1352358599000/MA_NewSMBOpptys", 'New SMB Opportunity'),'_parent'),
'[No Action Available]'))
CustomField.label: Other Action
